akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general Not later than 18 months after January 5, 2023, and every 5 years thereafter, the Secretary of Health and Human Services, acting through the Commissioner of the Administration for Native Americans (referred to in this section as the “Secretary”), shall undertake a survey of the use of all Native American languages in the United States.
(b) Updates Prior to conducting each subsequent survey after the initial survey under subsection (a), the Secretary shall update the survey in accordance with this section.
(c) Consultation required The Secretary shall design the initial survey under subsection (a) and each updated survey under subsection (b)—
(d) Contents Each survey under subsection (a) shall solicit—
(e) Coordination The Secretary may coordinate, and enter into cooperative agreements with, the Director of the Bureau of the Census for the purposes of carrying out this section.
(g) Limitation Nothing in this section requires an Indian tribe, Native American language community, or Native American language speaker—
